languages.text: "Более того..." {n}Префект машинально смачивает палец слюной, словно бы намереваясь перевернуть страницу.{/n} "Приказ ОРД-037/ЗН "Об обоюдном благодеянии и всяческом содействии представителей Адептус Вольному Торговцу (и наоборот)" был создан и лично заверен Теодорой фон Валанциус не без веской причины. Без этой меры мы рискуем вновь погрязнуть в пагубном вольнодумии... всех подписавшихся сторон. А вы, полагаю, понимаете, каких усилий стоит организовать некое подобие порядка. Убедительно прошу вас передумать".

traits.locale_text: "Более того..." {n}Префект машинально смачивает палец слюной, словно бы намереваясь перевернуть страницу.{/n} "Приказ номер ОРД-037/ЗН "Об обоюдном благодеянии и всяческом содействии представителей Адептус Вольному Торговцу (и наоборот)" был создан и лично заверен Теодорой фон Валанциус не без веской причины. Без этой меры мы рискуем вновь погрязнуть в пагубном вольнодумии... всех подписавшихся сторон. А вы, полагаю, понимаете, каких усилий стоит организовать некое подобие порядка. Убедительно прошу вас передумать".

languages.text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."
languages.original_text: "Более того..." {n}Префект машинально смачивает палец слюной, словно бы намереваясь перевернуть страницу.{/n} "Приказ ОРД-037/ЗН "Об обоюдном благодеянии и всяческом содействии представителей Адептус Вольному Торговцу (и наоборот)" был создан и лично заверен Теодорой фон Валанциус не без веской причины. Без этой меры мы рискуем вновь погрязнуть в пагубном вольнодумии... всех подписавшихся сторон. А вы, полагаю, понимаете, каких усилий стоит организовать некое подобие порядка. Убедительно прошу вас передумать".

traits.locale_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit as if about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between Adeptus Terra Representatives and the Rogue Trader' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sinking back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I don't need to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

"Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit as if about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between Adeptus Terra Representatives and the Rogue Trader' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

"Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

languages.text: « De plus... {n}La préfète se lèche le doigt par automatisme, comme si elle était sur le point de tourner une page invisible.{/n} Ce n'est pas pour rien que le décret ORD-037/ЗN portant sur "L'entraide et la coopération entre le libre-marchand et les agents de l'Adeptus Administratum et de l'Adeptus Arbites" a été rédigé et certifié par Théodora von Valancius. Si nous devions négliger cette mesure, nous risquerions de voir... l'un des partis susmentionnés sombrer à nouveau dans une pernicieuse libre-pensée. Je gage qu'il est inutile de vous expliquer à quel point il est difficile d'établir un semblant d'ordre. Je vous demande instamment de reconsidérer votre décision. »
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: « De plus... {n}La préfète se lèche le doigt par automatisme, comme si elle était sur le point de tourner une page invisible.{/n} Ce n'est pas pour rien que le décret ORD-037/ЗN portant sur "L'entraide et la coopération entre le libre-marchand et les agents de l'Adeptus Administratum et de l'Adeptus Arbites" a été rédigé et certifié par Théodora von Valancius. Si nous devions négliger cette mesure, nous risquerions de voir... l'un des partis susmentionnés sombrer à nouveau dans une pernicieuse libre-pensée. Je gage qu'il est inutile de vous expliquer à quel point il est difficile d'établir un semblant d'ordre. Je vous demande instamment de reconsidérer votre décision. »

languages.text: «Por si fuera poco...». {n}La prefecta se chupa el dedo por costumbre, como si fuera a pasar una página invisible.{/n} «El decreto ORD-037/ЗN "Sobre el mutuo reconocimiento y cooperación entre Comerciante Independiente y representantes del Adeptus Administratum y Adeptus Arbites" fue creado y certificado personalmente por Theodora von Valancius con buena razón. Si ignoráramos esta medida nos arriesgaríamos a que... cualquiera de las partes involucradas cayera en un peligroso librepensamiento. Seguro que no necesito decirle lo difícil que resulta imponer cualquier atisbo de orden. Le ruego que reconsidere su decisión».
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: «Por si fuera poco...». {n}La prefecta se chupa el dedo por costumbre, como si fuera a pasar una página invisible.{/n} «El decreto ORD-037/ЗN "Sobre el mutuo reconocimiento y cooperación entre Comerciante Independiente y representantes del Adeptus Administratum y Adeptus Arbites" fue creado y certificado personalmente por Theodora von Valancius con buena razón. Si ignoráramos esta medida nos arriesgaríamos a que... cualquiera de las partes involucradas cayera en un peligroso librepensamiento. Seguro que no necesito decirle lo difícil que resulta imponer cualquier atisbo de orden. Le ruego que reconsidere su decisión».

languages.text: “不仅如此……”{n}行政官习惯性地舔了舔手指，仿佛要翻开某本看不见的规章手册一样。{/n}“根据ORD-037/ЗN号法令，《关于行商浪人与帝国内政部及法务部代表之间的互利合作相关条款》，相关规定是由西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯亲自制定、批准的，双方的合作基于非常充分的理由。如果我们忽视相关规定，就可能会导致……上述三方其中任意一方受到自由思想的毒害。建立秩序这个任务究竟是何等艰巨，想必不需要我亲口告诉您。我在此强烈要求您重新考虑这个决定。”
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此……”{n}行政官习惯性地舔了舔手指，仿佛要翻开某本看不见的规章手册一样。{/n}“根据ORD-037/ЗN号法令，《关于行商浪人与帝国内政部及法务部代表之间的互利合作相关条款》，相关规定是由西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯亲自制定、批准的，双方的合作基于非常充分的理由。如果我们忽视相关规定，就可能会导致……上述三方其中任意一方受到自由思想的毒害。建立秩序这个任务究竟是何等艰巨，想必不需要我亲口告诉您。我在此强烈要求您重新考虑这个决定。”

languages.text: "Überdies ..." {n}Die Präfektin leckt sich aus Gewohnheit den Finger, als würde sie eine imaginäre Seite umblättern.{/n} "Dekret ORD-037/ЗN 'Zur gegenseitigen Wohltätigkeit und Zusammenarbeit zwischen der Freihändlerin und Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites' wurde von Theodora von Valancius aus gutem Grund erlassen und persönlich zertifiziert. Würden wir diesen Erlass missachten, liefen wir Gefahr, dass ... eine oder mehrere der genannten Parteien in verderbliche Freigeisterei zurückfallen. Ich muss Euch gewiss nicht erklären, wie anstrengend es ist, irgendeine Art von Ordnung zu etablieren. Ich bitte Euch daher, Eure Entscheidung zu überdenken."
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: "Überdies ..." {n}Die Präfektin leckt sich aus Gewohnheit den Finger, als würde sie eine imaginäre Seite umblättern.{/n} "Dekret ORD-037/ЗN 'Zur gegenseitigen Wohltätigkeit und Zusammenarbeit zwischen der Freihändlerin und Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites' wurde von Theodora von Valancius aus gutem Grund erlassen und persönlich zertifiziert. Würden wir diesen Erlass missachten, liefen wir Gefahr, dass ... eine oder mehrere der genannten Parteien in verderbliche Freigeisterei zurückfallen. Ich muss Euch gewiss nicht erklären, wie anstrengend es ist, irgendeine Art von Ordnung zu etablieren. Ich bitte Euch daher, Eure Entscheidung zu überdenken."

languages.text: 「さらに…」{n}まるで見えないページをめくろうとするかのように、総監は指を舐めた。{/n}「ORD-037/3N令『ローグトレーダーと帝国行政局および帝国裁定局の代表者間の相互恩恵および協力に関する法令』は、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスご自身の手によって制定・認証されたものです。当然、それには正当な理由があります。この措置を無視すれば、先述のいずれかの関係者が…有害な自由思想に逆戻りする危険があります。秩序らしきものを一から築くのがどれほど困難なことか、今さらあなたに言うまでもないでしょう。よく考え直すことを強くお勧めします」
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: 「さらに…」{n}まるで見えないページをめくろうとするかのように、総監は指を舐めた。{/n}「ORD-037/3N令『ローグトレーダーと帝国行政局および帝国裁定局の代表者間の相互恩恵および協力に関する法令』は、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスご自身の手によって制定・認証されたものです。当然、それには正当な理由があります。この措置を無視すれば、先述のいずれかの関係者が…有害な自由思想に逆戻りする危険があります。秩序らしきものを一から築くのがどれほど困難なことか、今さらあなたに言うまでもないでしょう。よく考え直すことを強くお勧めします」

languages.text: "Dahası..." {n}Prefekt, sanki görünmez bir sayfayı çevirmek üzereymiş gibi alışkanlıktan parmağının ucunu yalıyor.{/n} "ORD-037/3N Sayılı 'Hür Tacir ile Adeptus Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites Temsilcileri Arasında Karşılıklı Yardımlaşma ve İş Birliği Kararnamesi', Theodora von Valancius tarafından iyi bir sebep üzerine oluşturulup şahsen onaylandı. Eğer bu tedbiri göz ardı edecek olursak az önce bahsi geçen taraflardan birinin zararlı özgür düşüncelere kapılması riskini almış oluruz. Bir düzenin varlığına dair görüntü oluşturmanın ne kadar büyük bir zorluk olduğunu söylememe gerek yok. Tekrar düşünmenizi şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Furthermore..." {n}The prefect licks her finger out of habit, as though she were about to turn an invisible page.{/n} "Decree ORD-037/ЗN 'On Mutual Benefaction and Cooperation Between the Rogue Trader and Representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites' was created and personally certified by Theodora von Valancius for good reason. If we were to disregard this measure, we would risk having... any of the aforementioned parties sink back into pernicious freethinking. I am sure I need not to tell you what a great undertaking it is to establish any semblance of order. I strongly urge you to reconsider."

Eğer bu tedbiri göz ardı edecek olursak az önce bahsi geçen taraflardan birinin zararlı özgür düşüncelere kapılması riskini almış oluruz. Bir düzenin varlığına dair görüntü oluşturmanın ne kadar büyük bir zorluk olduğunu söylememe gerek yok. Tekrar düşünmenizi şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum."
